sentences.en: He lost his health, and therefore his difficulties increased.
sentences.cn: 他身体虚弱, 因此更增加了他的困难.

sentences.en: He was a businessman , and therefore he always has an eye out for any opportunity to make money.
sentences.cn: 他是商人, 总见钱眼开.

sentences.en: He was ill, and therefore could not come.
sentences.cn: 他病了, 所以未能来.

sentences.en: It rained and therefore the football match was postponed.
sentences.cn: 天下雨,足球赛因此而延期了.

sentences.en: Men are anxious to improve their circumstances, but are unwilling to improve themselves; they therefore remain bound.--James Allen
sentences.cn: 人们总是渴望改善周遭环境，但是却不愿意改善自己，因此总停留在原地，无法进步。

sentences.en: No evidence has been found in the case so far and therefore it is probably a libelous suit.
Progress so far has been very good. We are, therefore, confident that the work will be completed on time.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止进展十分顺利，所以我们有把握按时完成工作。

sentences.en: Rescue workers are therefore drilling a hole on the north side of the mine.
sentences.cn: 因此营救工人正在矿井北侧钻孔.

sentences.en: Some people may manage their finances badly and therefore have to go short of essentials.
sentences.cn: 有些人可能极不善于理财，因而不得不缺衣少食地将就过活。

sentences.en: The Chinese Christians, therefore, practically excommunicate themselves from their own clan.
sentences.cn: 所以, 中国的基督徒简直是被逐出了自己的家族了.

sentences.en: The lime water has turned cloudy, therefore carbon dioxide has been produced during the experiment.
sentences.cn: 石灰水变得混浊了, 可见在实验中有二氧化碳生成了.

sentences.en: The stewards' badges are made so they do not unstick from a car and therefore cannot be passed around.
sentences.cn: 为乘务员制作了徽章，这样它们就不会从车厢上脱落下来，也不会被传来传去。

sentences.en: Their car was bigger and therefore more comfortable.
sentences.cn: 他们的车大些，所以更舒适些。

sentences.en: Therefore, above all things else , he loathed his miserable self!
sentences.cn: 因此, 他厌恶不幸的自我尤胜其它!

sentences.en: Therefore, he shook his head in the most gentle negative.
sentences.cn: 因此, 他极其温柔地摇摇头表示否定.

sentences.en: They had seen him trawling and therefore knew that there were fish.
sentences.cn: 他们曾见过他用拖网捕鱼，因此知道那里有鱼。

sentences.en: They therefore can do nothing good of themselves.
sentences.cn: 所以他们靠自己是什么好事也做不成的.
